docs.text: ZIPING MA maziping.im@gmail.com I am Ziping Ma (马子平), a first-year M.S. student of Peking University. I have joined the Communication and Information Security Laboratory, under the supervision of Prof. Yuesheng Zhu. My current research interests include data hiding, image generation, and deep learning. EDUCATION Peking University September 2021 - Present School of Electronic and Computer Engineering M.S candidate. Central South University September 2017 - June 2021 School of Computer Science and Engineering B.E. in Computer Science and Technology Qingdao No.2 Middle School of Shandong Province September 2014 - June 2017 PUBLICATION 2022 Image disentanglement autoencoder for steganography without embedding X Liu, Ziping Ma , J Ma, J Zhang, G Schaefer, H Fang IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition 2022 [Released Code] 2021 Joint compressive autoencoders for full-image-to-image hiding X Liu, Ziping Ma , X Guo, J Hou, L Wang, J Zhang, G Schaefer, H Fang 2020 25th International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR) 2020 Camouflage generative adversarial network: Coverless full-image-to-image hiding X Liu, Ziping Ma , X Guo, J Hou, G Schaefer, L Wang, V Wang, H Fang 2020 IEEE International Conference on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics (SMC) Micro-expression Video Clip Synthesis Method based on Spatial-temporal Statistical Model and Motion Intensity Evaluation Function L Wang, J Hou, X Guo, Ziping Ma , X Liu, H Fang 2020 IEEE International Conference on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics (SMC)
